issues.description: The problem statement refers to REST endpoints using the "/api" prefix (e.g., PUT /api/persons/{personId}/parents), but the PersonResource controller in the template is mapped without any "/api" prefix (e.g., @PutMapping("persons/{personId}/parents")). This mismatch will lead students to call or test endpoints that do not exist, causing confusion and broken tests.
issues.suggested_fix: Either update the controller mappings to include the "/api" prefix (for example, add path="/api" at the class-level @RequestMapping) or revise the problem statement to drop the "/api" prefix so that instructions align with the actual mappings.

This mismatch can confuse students when calling the correct URI.
